article.title: Status and history for [lav]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Corrected a markup error (tag of title for article 25), thanks to Lane Schwartz.

it seems that between the original source and the OHCHR, the data was misinterpreted along the way (probably from some less common 8 bit encoding to a Windows code page), so many “high ASCII” characters were damaged. Thanks to Arthur Reutenauer for providing a repaired version.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
